definitions.definition: A stringed instrument related to the violin family, but held in the lap between the legs like a cello , usually with C-holes , a flat back, a fretted neck and six strings, played with an underhanded bow hold .
A large rope used to manipulate the anchor

main_definition: ( music ) A stringed instrument related to the violin family, but held in the lap between the legs like a cello , usually with C-holes , a flat back, a fretted neck and six strings, played with an underhanded bow hold .
secondary_definitions: ( nautical ) A large rope used to manipulate the anchor
